TopicTitle: I'm increasingly starting to hate KerbalStuff.

Articles.Content:
9 minutes ago, boxman said:

Maybe you should read the actual note on the kerbalstuff page?? The way squad has been ignoring the site and the legal threats are some of the reason he himself used for shutting down the site.

So if you think this is bull, then go blame SirCmpwn instead.

I have. Several times.

I have no interest in pointing blame on any particular individual at this time. SirCmpwn had his reasons and they were valid for him. 
As for my reply to the question "I mean who talks like that?" my answer was valid as well. Knee jerk reactions, singling out people, and threads starting with "I'm increasingly starting to hate (put your subject here)" is the root of what's been going on around here. Children and immature individuals do this.

Adults and mature people post possible solutions to a problem. 

As of now I'm unfollowing this thread. A possible solution has been reached in regards to Kerbalstuff in the form of a new website and this is now a moot conversation.

Edited February 15, 2016 by GDJ

1 minute ago, boxman said:

And if you read my post you would see I included the community part.

Nope, that got lost in between our edits - as you can see from the text I quoted - nobody's fault.
No point in arguing amongst ourselves lets see if we can get kerbalstuff revived
Kerbalstuff threads are getting out of hand. There are at least 5 already. Let's please take the discussion to this one, which I believe is the original.
